fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
(*Incite*) / 3 uses
- Choose a player: chosen players will permanently attack visitors with a powerful attack starting this night, you are excluded.

(*Last Stand*) / 1 use
- Kill yourself at night, three players at random will die as well, bypassing defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - All players have the ability to target two players.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the final four players without an evil organization holding a majority over the town.
